articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Giuliano Fulvi, president of the Italian Chinese Kung Fu Association.
 It was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to Italy by the president on Feb. 19.
   
 The president wished Kim Jong Il, the supreme leader of the DPRK, good health and greater success in his work to promote the well-being of the Korean people and accomplish the cause of national reunification.

articles.title: DPRK's Just Measure Supported
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off the Press in Russia 
    Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" was brought out in booklet on Feb. 14 by the Russian Association for the Development of Friendship and Cooperation with Foreign Countries.
 The work, published on April 18, Juche 87 (1998), comprehensively clarifies the principles and tasks for achieving the great national unity such as the issue of creditably carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's idea of great national unity and the idea that the great national unity precisely means national reunification and it should be achieved on the principle of national independence under the banner of patriotism and national reunification.
 The booklet in its preface notes that the association has the pleasure to publish this work to convey to posterity the undying revolutionary feats performed by Kim Jong Il in building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation and accomplishing the cause of the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the human cause of independence.

Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Polish Ambassador 
    Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today met and had a talk with Polish Ambassador e.p. to the DPRK Wojciech Kaluza when the latter paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
